references.paper_title: PyTorch 2: Faster Machine Learning Through Dynamic Python Bytecode Transformation and Graph Compilation
references.reason: This paper introduces PyTorch 2, a significant update to the popular machine learning framework, which enhances efficiency and is used as the attention backend in the presented work.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive benchmark suite for video generative models
references.reason: VBench serves as a crucial benchmark for evaluating the quality of video generation, providing a standardized metric used for comparison in this research.
This paper proposes multi-step consistency distillation, a technique adopted to reduce sampling steps and enhance the efficiency of video generation in this work.
This work introduces consistency models which distills multiple steps ODE to one step, a method used to accelerate diffusion inference and is also adopted in this work.

references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: CogVideoX-5B, based on the MM-DiT architecture, is used to demonstrate the generalizability of the proposed method for video generation.
